client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first encountered Sanders Wouters Mertens at a golf tournament in Brussels. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Sanders Wouters Mertens is a 21 year old and comes from Belgium.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description_Family_Background: Sanders Wouters Mertens is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: In 2021, Sanders graduated from Institut Saint-Stanislas with a secondary school diploma.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Sanders Wouters Mertens is a 21 year old and comes from Belgium.
Sanders Wouters Mertens did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 1050000 EUR from his grandmother, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2019, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Sanders achieve financial success and security as he embarks on his professional journey.
